request.description:
Sample Payload:
```json
{
    "bankId": "bank1",
    "question": "What is the capital of Italy?",
    "variableIds": [
        "v1"
    ],
    "points": 3,
    "options": [
        "Rome",
        "Paris",
        "Madrid",
        "Berlin"
    ],
    "answerIndex": 0
}
```

        "bankId": "bank1",
        "question": "Which planet is known as the Red Planet?",
        "variableIds": [

        ],
        "points": 2,
        "options": [
            "Earth",
            "Mars",

            "Saturn"

        "answerIndex": 1
    },
    {
        "bankId": "bank1",
        "question": "Which language is used for Android development?",
        "variableIds": [

        ],
        "points": 3,
        "options": [
            "Swift",
            "Kotlin",
            "JavaScript",
            "Python"
        ],
        "answerIndex": 1
    }
]
